setting.title: Client
setting.columnlabels: Customer Code,Customer Name,Pan No,Contact Person,Designation,Mobile No,Landline No,Email Id,State,Area,Website,Address,Industry,Campaign,Exposure,Business,Client Group,Assign To,Subscription Status,Start Date,Software End Date,Whatsapp End Date,Contact Type
setting.query: SELECT * FROM tbl_client LEFT JOIN tbl_designation ON designation_designationid=client_designationid LEFT JOIN tbl_state ON state_stateid=client_stateid LEFT JOIN tbl_city ON city_cityid=client_cityid LEFT JOIN tbl_industrytypes ON industrytypes_industrytypesid=client_industrytypesid LEFT JOIN tbl_campaign ON campaign_campaignid=client_campaignid LEFT JOIN tbl_exposure ON exposure_exposureid=client_exposureid LEFT JOIN tbl_business ON business_businessid=client_businessid LEFT JOIN tbl_clientgroup ON clientgroup_clientgroupid=client_clientgroupid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON employee_employeeid=client_employeeid LEFT JOIN tbl_subscriptionstatus ON subscriptionstatus_subscriptionstatusid=client_subscriptionstatusid LEFT JOIN tbl_contacttype ON contacttype_contacttypeid=client_contacttypeid LEFT JOIN tbl_kycbankdetail on kycbankdetail_clientid=client_clientid
setting.where:
('$client_stateid$' = '0' OR client_stateid = '$client_stateid$') AND ('$client_cityid$' = '0' OR client_cityid = '$client_cityid$') AND ('$client_industrytypesid$' = '0' OR client_industrytypesid = '$client_industrytypesid$') AND ('$client_businessid$' = '0' OR ','+client_businessintoids like '%,$client_businessid$%') AND ('$client_businesstypeid$' = '0' OR ','+client_businesstypeids like '%,$client_businesstypeid$%') AND ('$client_exportannualturnoverid$' = '0' OR client_exportannualturnoverid = '$client_exportannualturnoverid$') AND ('$client_importannualturnoverid$' = '0' OR client_importannualturnoverid = '$client_importannualturnoverid$') AND ('$client_enterprisetypeid$' = '0' OR ','+client_enterprisetypeids like '%,$client_enterprisetypeid$%') AND ('$client_importexportcountryid$' = '0' OR ','+client_importingexportingcountryids like '%,$client_importexportcountryid$%') AND ('$client_currencydealinginid$' = '0' OR ','+client_currencydealingids like '%,$client_currencydealinginid$%') AND ('$client_hedgingpolicyid$' = '0' OR ','+client_hedgingpolicyids like '%,$client_hedgingpolicyid$%') AND ('$client_exposuresoftwareid$' = '0' OR ','+client_exposuresheetmaintainedids like '%,$client_exposuresoftwareid$%') AND ('$client_forwardlimitid$' = '0' OR ','+client_forwardlimitsids like '%,$client_forwardlimitid$%') AND ('$client_forwardcontractbookingid$' = '0' OR ','+client_forwardcontractbookingids like '%,$client_forwardcontractbookingid$%') AND ('$client_bookingtypeid$' = '0' OR ','+client_typeofbookingids like '%,$client_bookingtypeid$%') AND ('$client_fundingtypeid$' = '0' OR ','+client_typeoffundingids like '%,$client_fundingtypeid$%') AND ('$client_bankauditbankid$' = '0' OR kycbankdetail_bankauditbankid = '$client_bankauditbankid$') AND ('$client_iskycupdated$' = '-1' OR client_iskycupdated = '$client_iskycupdated$')
AND ('$txtclient_sanctionedletterrenewaldate_from$' = '' OR kycbankdetail_sanctionedletterrenewaldate >= '$client_sanctionedletterrenewaldate_from$') AND ('$txtclient_sanctionedletterrenewaldate_to$' = '' OR kycbankdetail_sanctionedletterrenewaldate <= '$client_sanctionedletterrenewaldate_to$')
